refbody.section: PurposeExecute a command line interface (CLI) command script. The script must exist on the appliance in a special directory.

dlentry.dd: Name of a script in the /etc/bedrock/scripts directory.

refbody.section: Related CommandsSee the "Customizing and extending the CLI" page in the SDK documentation for more scripting options, including the command.

ExampleDisplay a script called hello and then use the source command to run it.Console> busybox # cat /etc/bedrock/scripts/hello # Bedrock Project, WebSphere Technologyu Institute # Copyright 2009-2010, IBM Corporation echo hello world # exit Console> source hello hello world Console>
Information for consumers onlyThis command is intended for consumer use only.
